page.title: 19Aspects of religion
page.content: Rev. Francis Hewitt,who lives in Lastingham,is responsible for 4 other parishes and is assisted by a Lay reader & several retired clergy. He is also the Rural Dean of Helmsley. Each church has its parochial church council & one or two services are held in all churches each Sunday. A recent venture has been combined services for all 5 parishes on special church festivals & these have been quite succesful but most prefer their own church services. The introduction of the Alternative Service Book for some services has not yet been fully accepted. After a lapse of many years a choir & sunday school have been re-introduced. Once a fortnight there is a service held in Lastinghams Wesleyan chapel & a similar service is held once a week at Cropton.
